message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.RO, cs.GR 

This paper addresses the problem of Monocular Depth Estimation (MDE) using a novel Adversarial View-Consistent Learning (AVCL) framework. The paper proposes a differentiable depth map warping operation and a pose generator to generate novel views for a given image in an adversarial manner. These techniques are commonly used in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) research. Additionally, the paper uses adversarial learning, which is a popular technique in generative models and deep learning (cs.AI). The proposed framework also involves pose estimation, which is a common problem in robotics (cs.RO) and graphics (cs.GR).
